lyrics:
5 contributorsstarting all over lyricsuh huh uh huh
to feel a new touch to smell a new scent

id say that im so glad to find a new valentine

so this is the perfect harmony
uh huh uh huh
for this melody

but your smile is like the sun that rise
so girl i wont mind
